thread.title: Sanjay Kapoor's character in 'Shaandaar' inspired by Bappida
thread.title_full: Sanjay Kapoor's character in 'Shaandaar' inspired by Bappida - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Sanjay Kapoor's character in 'Shaandaar' inspired by Bappida
text:
I am told *Sanjay Kapoor*'s character in 'Shaandaar' is inspired by veteran music composer *Bappi Lahiri*, down to his obsession with bling.*Sanjay Kapoor and Bappi Lahiri*
So, true to character, Sanjay is made to wear all things gold including his jacket and trousers. Might be a good idea to keep your sunglasses handy in case ... Â»
